title: shAhA varam
sahitya:
shAgA varam aruLvAI rAmA catur marai nAthA sarOja pAdA
caraNam 1 AkAshat-tIkAl nirmaN attanai bhUtamum ottu niraindAi
EkAmirtamAghiya ninnAL iNai sharaNenrAl idu muDiyAdA

caraNam 2  vAgAr tOL vIrA dhIrA manmata rUpA vAnavar bhUpA
pagArmozhi sItaiyin menrOn pazhagiya mArbA padamavar shArbA

caraNam 3 nityA nirmalA rAmA niSkaLankA sarvA dhArA
 satyA sadAnandA rAmA sharaNam sharaNam sharaNam udArA
